content.description: Start at a good landing just at the mouth of the cave on the left. climb up past the first lump of grass, traverse left under the 2nd and stay out where you're most exposed over the water. The "crux" is a step left with two great handholds but not much for feet. After this step-across, continue up and left on big, plentiful holds. When you reach the big clump of grass at the corner, that's the jump-off.
content.location: Large wall with an obvious Cave in it located about 2/3rds of the way up the Lower Canyon on the left as you're travelling away from the Marina. The location on the map is accurate. Compare with photos.

content.description: At the moment there is one main event at this cliff, The Cave Traverse, but no doubt more routes and variations will be coming this season. There is room for more.
